backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a VPS client management system with CRUD operations for client records (including VM status, OS, plan expiry), global announcements, network monitoring, notifications, chat messages, and chat system status toggle.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the refresh button implementation in ClientDashboard.tsx with high confidence, linked to test REQ-2 and multiple component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including authentication hooks, React Query hooks, UI components, pages, and styling with Carbon Black/Neon Green theme details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a dark theme color palette using oklch color space for both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the LuidCorporation Dashboard Ecosystem application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with admin/client routes, authentication providers, dark theme enforcement, layout with footer, and protected route wrappers.
frontend/src/components/AdminChatPanel.t: Admin chat management interface with client list, message history display, typing indicators, unread counts, and message sending functionality using React Query hooks.
frontend/src/components/AdminProfileDisp: Admin profile display component showing avatar with initials, username from auth context, and administrator badge with shield icon.
frontend/src/components/ChatSystemStatus: Status indicator card displaying chat system online/offline state with colored circle icon and descriptive text using useChatSystemStatus hook.
Admin control panel with radio group to toggle chat system between online and offline states, showing status descriptions and using mutation hooks with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ChatWidget.tsx: A floating chat widget component that allows clients to send messages to admin support, displays message history, typing indicators, unread counts, and shows online/offline status.
A modal dialog component for editing existing client records, including fields for credentials, VPS details, plan information, operating system selection, and plan expiry date picker.
frontend/src/components/ClientList.tsx: Displays a table of all registered clients with actions to edit, delete, send notifications, and update VM status; includes modals for editing and sending notifications.
frontend/src/components/ClientProfileMen: A dropdown menu component showing authenticated client profile information including name, ID, plan details, expiry date, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/ClientProtectedR: A route guard component that redirects unauthenticated clients to the home page and only renders children for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/ClientRegistrati: A form component for registering new clients with fields for ID, name, password, VPS credentials, plan details, operating system selection, and plan expiry date.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A simple footer component displaying copyright information for LuidCorporation 2026.
frontend/src/components/GlobalAnnounceme: Displays a prominent animated banner at the top of the page showing global announcements fetched from the backend, hidden when no announcement exists.
Admin component for creating, updating, and clearing global announcements displayed to all clients. Uses form with textarea, save/delete buttons, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/NetworkMonitorin: Admin component with radio buttons to toggle network monitoring status between 'normal' (2.5-4.8 Gbps) and 'offline' (0 Gbps) modes.
frontend/src/components/NetworkSpeedChar: Displays a real-time line chart of network speed in Gbps using Recharts, showing current speed and historical data from simulation hook.
frontend/src/components/NotificationBell: Bell icon popover showing unread count badge, global announcements, and client-specific notifications with clear functionality. Displays scrollable list of messages.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated admin users to login page, only rendering children when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/RdpInstructionsC: Card displaying step-by-step instructions for connecting to Windows VPS via Remote Desktop Protocol, including IP copy button and credential details.
frontend/src/components/SendNotification: Modal dialog for admins to send individual notifications to specific clients with textarea input and form submission handling.
frontend/src/components/SshInstructionsC: Card showing SSH connection instructions for Ubuntu servers with formatted command, copy-to-clipboard button, and terminal usage tips.
frontend/src/components/VMStatusIndicato: React component that displays VM status (online, offline, maintenance) with color-coded indicators and descriptions in a card layout.
frontend/src/components/VpsCredentialsCa: React component that displays VPS credentials (IP, username, password, plan) in a card with password visibility toggle functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, automatically recreating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.tsx: Context provider and hook for admin authentication with hardcoded credentials, supporting both localStorage and sessionStorage for session persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientAuth.tsx: Context provider and hook for client authentication that manages client data and session persistence with optional 'remember me' functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login/logout flows, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworkSpeedSimula: Custom hook that simulates network speed data (2.5-4.8 Gbps) with realistic oscillation patterns, updating every 2 seconds and respecting monitoring status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on client records, VM status, notifications, chat messages, and system settings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom carbon black and neon green theme variables for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page with form for ID/password authentication, remember-me checkbox, and navigation to admin panel on successful login using useAdminAuth hook.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabs for managing clients and chat, includes client registration, announcements, network monitoring, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboard.tsx: Client dashboard displaying VPS credentials, network monitoring, VM status, and SSH/RDP instructions with a refresh button to reload data from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/ClientLogin.tsx: Client login page that authenticates users via backend actor, validates credentials, and uses useClientAuth hook with remember-me option to persist sessions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme (carbon-black, neon-green), animations, and design tokens for the application's dark theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking feature requests to fix 'keep me logged in' functionality and add a client data refresh button, with architectural notes and issue tracking.
